basic.blooming: Flowering period April-May, fruiting period May-August
basic.color: Flower color light green, fruit color red, purpleblack

maintenance.soil: Peat or soil with specific nutrients
maintenance.sunlight: Like sunshine, resistant to half shade
maintenance.watering: Watering only when soil is dry, water thoroughly
maintenance.pruning: Pruning in spring for those planted in winter, for those planted in spring, pruning when planting, keep the cuts smooth and even
